name: Marble Power Blast
description:
Description:
Play Marble Power Blast, a Match-3 marble shooter game! Get beautiful HD backgrounds in 50 levels and 7 different locations/themes.
Unlock the shuffle gaming mode and generate your own levels with random calculated difficulty, marble waves, length and number of colors.

Compete with your friends and compare online highscores and Achievements while playing Marble Power Blast. Save your game state up in the cloud for playing on all
your phones and tablets (or get your old game state on your new mobile device!)


Features:
- 50 challenging levels
- 7 different locations/themes
- 3 special items for a better gameplay in different situations
- random mode for endless, automatic generated levels (gets unlocked at level 10)
- high resolution beautiful graphics
- cloud save for playing on different devices
- compete with your friends Online Achievements and Highscore
